data.text: Dughiar mamɨn aseba Godɨn Nguibamɨn uari akuvazɨ,
Ia deragh gumazamizir uarira uarir akurvaghan koghamiba ko, borir afeziaba ariaghirezibar akurvagh.
Gumazamizir gavgaviba puvatɨziba ko, onganarazibagh amiba,
“Me nɨghnɨzir aghuitam men itir puvatɨzɨ, me bizitam gɨfozir puvatɨ.
“Kɨ Godɨn Bar Pɨn Itim kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze,
Ia gumaziba ariaghiri moghɨn uaghan arɨmɨghiregham.
O God, nɨ dɨkavigh izɨ nguazimɨn gumazamiziba bar me gativagh men araziba tuisɨgh.
